overview.en: EOSABC is an online betting game platform based on EOS blockchain, it leverages the advantages of blockchain to enhance the transparency and fairness of betting games, thus guaranteeing the financial security and user experience of each player, and truly achieve fairness and user-oriented.
overview.zh: EOSABC是基于EOS公链的竞猜游戏平台,平台通过结合区块链公开透明和不可篡改的优势，提升了竞猜游戏行业的透明度和公平性，从而保证每一名玩家的资金安全和用户体验，真正做到公平与以用户为核心。
